fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: Sacrifice a player and protect another

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- All negatives actions on the second player are redirected silently to the first player
- If the second player dies, the first player and High Protector will die instead
- If there were any other kills that night, the High Protector will not die from the second player dying
- You must use your ability each night
